content: That's really helpful, thanks for the ventilation tips! I'll definitely make sure to check the cowshed and chicken coop regularly to ensure they're well-ventilated. Speaking of the cowshed, I'm glad I got those new water buckets in time, they're making a big difference. By the way, do you know if there are any specific regulations or guidelines I should be aware of when it comes to disposing of manure and waste from the farm?
